phrs.translation: 舍弗勒, 轴承, 德国, 粗粒
布匹头尾的散边口, 散边, 散边散端到头了, 散端
舍弗勒, 德国舍弗勒

sentences.sentence: It's too much of a fag to go out.
sentences.translation: 外出活动真叫人吃不消。

sentences.sentence: I only caught the fag end of their conversation.
sentences.translation: 我仅听到他们谈话的结尾。

sentences.sentence: He never had much confidence in his judgement at the fag-end of the working day.
sentences.translation: 他向来对自己在快下班那个烦人时段的判断力不报什么信心。
